feed.title: Big Trout Lake - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Big Trout Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:12 PM CST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Partly Cloudy, -28.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Big Trout Lake Airport 5:00 PM CST Sunday 29 January 2023
Condition: Partly Cloudy
Temperature: -28.6°C
Pressure: 102.2 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 70 %
Wind Chill: -39
Dewpoint: -32.3°C
Wind: WNW 13 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 32.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 32. Wind chill minus 38 this evening and minus 43 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Sunny. High minus 23.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High minus 23. Wind chill minus 44 in the morning and minus 34 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 28. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming northwest 20 overnight. Low minus 28. Wind chill near minus 38. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 29 January 2023
